doc.field: floodplain: Rappahannock River Basin GIS Datasets (Datastack)

This collection (stacked series) of datasets is provided to the UVA Library's Scholars' Lab by the Middle Peninsula Planning District Commission (MPPDC), Virginia, USA, and is provided AS-IS with no guarantees as regards to its accuracy or temporal currency. It pertains primarily to the hydrology, land use, population, and related infrastructure for the entire Rappahannock River Basin area, to be used for watershed planning and educational purposes. * // * The temporal extent of the datasets in the datastack is generally from 1998, but some datasets may include data that originated earlier. * // * Datasets/Layers included in this datastack (with non-exclusive list of included attributes): * Watershed Boundary * VDCR State Hydrologic Units * Basin Hydrology (streams and rivers) * Wetlands - incl. USFWS National Wetlands Inventory (NWI) classifications. * FEMA Floodplain Data - incl. zone descriptions (A = no base flood elevations determined, AE = base flood elevations determined, X = outside of 100 year flood plain) * Land Use data - incl. general land use classifications and county- specific zoning codes. * Locality data - incl. county and city boundaries, 1990 US Census population counts and population densities * Onsite Septic System Suitability Classifications * Prime Agricultural Soils * Federal and State Public Lands - incl. administrating agency * Primary and Secondary Roads - incl. route #s. * Virginia Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (VPDES) discharge point locations - incl. DEQ permit#, discharge rate (in permitted millions of gallons per day: MGD), stream and river discharged into, and discharger name and contact info. * // * More detailed descriptions of the datasets and coding schemes can be found via the "extra resources" UVA link provided.
